title: 113: Figuring Out Your Dual Dosha with Dr. Suhas Kshirsagar
itunes:title: 113: Figuring Out Your Dual Dosha with Dr. Suhas Kshirsagar
description:
Dr. Suhas is back for a long-awaited part 2 podcast episode! This time we went deep into the dual Doshas, a topic many of you are confused about, and how to remain balanced when you are a cross in-between.

We also get deep into Jyotish (Vedic) Astrology and how your chart will tell you so much of your health history—including your Dosha! I am always SO honored to have Dr. Suhas, a world renown Ayurvedic Doctor, here with us and am truly blessed to have him as a mentor.

We discuss:
-Balancing dual Doshas (a topic many of you are confused about)
-Jyotish (Vedic) Astrology and how your chart will tell you so much of your health history—including your Dosha
-How your Dosha is related to your Dharma
-This is the long-awaited part 2 podcast interview with my dear mentor Dr. Suhas you’ve been requesting since Episode 51!

Receive your organic cotton feminine hygiene products at mylola.com, with code “sahara” for 40% off your subscription

Get 35% off your order of Youveda supplements at youveda.com with code “sahara”

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Join my Awaken Your Powers Masterclass to become a leader in the new paradigm with Shaman Durek: https://www.iamsahararose.com/awaken-your-powers


Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dosha and receive custom results for your mind and body with my free quiz at eatfeelfresh.com/new-quiz

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books Eat Feel Fresh + Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda: https://www.iamsahararose.com/books

This podcast is for educational purposes only. The host claims no responsibility to any person or entity for any liability, loss, or damage caused or alleged to be caused directly or indirectly as a result of the use, application, or interpretation of the information presented herein.
